purpose: Template repository for compliance checking frameworks - defines standards and check scripts
important_notes: ⚠️ This is a TEMPLATE repository - it defines compliance standards and check scripts
⚠️ The ACTUAL compliance checks for labrats-work run in the 'labrats-compliance' repository
This repository provides the framework that labrats-compliance uses
Changes here should be synced to labrats-compliance when updating standards
guidelines: This is the template for compliance checking frameworks
Compliance checks are modular - each check is a separate script
Use GITHUB_TOKEN for same-repo operations, App token for cross-repo
Template file approach for issue bodies, not heredocs
Always check for existing open issues before creating new ones
Compliance checks should be self-checking (framework checks itself)

related_repositories.labrats-compliance: Active compliance checking repository for labrats-work organization
related_repositories.github-repo-standards: This template repository - defines standards and checks

important_files.COMPLIANCE.md: Source of truth for compliance standards (COMP-001 to COMP-020)

workflow_for_updates: 1. Update compliance standards in this template repository
2. Test changes locally with compliance check scripts
4. Run compliance workflow in labrats-compliance to validate
